about_the_game:
Bestiary of Sigillum is a one-on-one competitive online game that blends the depth of a turn-based strategy with the diversity of the MOBA genre.
This demo allows you to try your hands at the game with a limited set of heroes to see if you're ready to handle the full power of Bestiary. In this free edition, 18 out of 27 characters are available; all modes are unlocked with no further restrictions. You can play ranked, create custom lobbies or practice with AI.
